name: Contract J.A.C.K.
description:
Contract J.A.C.K. is an action-shooter game developed by Monolith Productions. It came out on 20-11-2003. It was published by Sierra Entertainment. Contract J.A.C.K. has a Metascore of 56, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Contract J.A.C.K. is available on PC.
It was produced by Ellen Beeman.
